content: say hello to your new favorite layering piece the boxy blooms cardigan this cropped boxy layering piece has a deep v-neck and a 3-button closure it features a mix of stitches for a beautifully lacy texture that s both lightweight and eye-catching perfect for warm weather or layering year-round this pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you every step of the way the free pattern can be found on my blog 1 a lion brand kit is available 2 it comes with all the yarn you need to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the printable pdf download you can also customize your yarn colors a full video tutorial is available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-boxy-blooms-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/4wcs2 3 https //youtu be/4pfk2ivpgfk
